name: Pixel Entropy (CrispyPin, Erikbot)
description:
Stop the evil entropy from making plants and creatures go extinct in this pixel based physics sandbox.

Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 72 hours,
please leave a rating at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/pixel-entropy if you are participating :)

The web version will lag more than if you download it
Also the mac version is not tested

Source code is here if you want to laugh at it:
https://github.com/CrispyPin/ld-50/
